definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if

sentences.english: Well-known news sites, an overview of world affairs, focused news hot.
sentences.chinese: 知名新闻资讯网站，纵览天下大事，聚焦新闻热点。

sentences.english: A brief survey of residential architecture up to the Mamluk period.
sentences.chinese: 到马鲁姆克时期为止的住宅建筑纵览。

sentences.english: A view of the upper courtyard of Neuschwanstein Castle, still under construction, as it appeared in 1886 -- the year of Ludwig's death.(Joseph
sentences.chinese: 纵览仍在兴建之中的新天鹅堡的上庭院。

sentences.english: The survey-style approach of these textbooks is their greatest fault.
sentences.chinese: 这种概观纵览式的方法是这些教科书所犯的最大错误。

sentences.english: He surveyed the whole of the decretalist literature .
sentences.chinese: 他纵览了全部教令文献。

definition: to take a broad view of sth
to take in the whole scene at once/to have a panoramic view
to look intensively/to feast one's eyes on
to overlook/to look down from a height
to get a bird's-eye view/bird's-eye view/broad overview
surging forward with great momentum/unfolding on a magnificent scale
to view/to look at/to look sth over
to stand tall and see far (idiom); taking the long and broad view/acute foresight
to take an overall view of sth/comprehensive view
